Banning Mike (Gerard Butler) is a dedicated employee of the U.S. Secret Service, which is to protect the President Benjamin Asher (Aaron Eckhart) and his family. To take them to a Christmas party, an intense blizzard makes the car they are the president and his wife, Margaret (Ashley Judd), have an accident. Mike manages to save Benjamin, but the first lady dies. Since then, Mike is shifted to a service bureaucratic office in Washington, which he hates. Eighteen months later, the White House is attacked by North Korean terrorists. Seeing the panic in the population and the danger that the president runs, Mike goes to the White House to help in what may. With all the local security staff decimated, it becomes the only hope in the White House to fight the terrorists and save the President.
